linkedin_post.subject: Regarding SDE opportunity
linkedin_post.body:
Hi,
I saw your post on Linkedin regarding open positions for SDE 1 at {company_name}. Could you please refer to me for the same. I have provided all my information, do let me know if you need anything else.
Email -> udbhavsharma0@gmail.com
Phone number: 6394999421
Job Role: SDE 1
Codeforce profile: https://codeforces.com/profile/udbhavsharma
LeetCode profile: https://leetcode.com/u/udbhavsharma0/

Why I am fit for this role - Udbhav is a strong candidate due to his technical expertise and Bachelor's degree from IIT (ISM) Dhanbad. He is doing great work at Paisabazaar as SDE. His proficiency in competitive programming, problem-solving, data structures and algorithms and web development along with his previous internship at Standard Chartered Bank, has equipped him with practical experience. He achieved an AIR of 65 in the ICPC preliminary round across all regions. Additionally, he possesses leadership qualities, and the ability to work well in teams, making him a valuable asset to the company.

Thanks
